root.name: WildSnake
root.description: Alexey Pajitnov on WIldSnake"In the early 1980s, I developed Tetris as a simple exercise in mathematics. I could not have dreamed the impact it would have in the world of games. WildSnake carries on the challenging and addicting tradition of Tetris and I am proud to endorse the product. I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I do."
